item.title: Nearly 1 in 4 American households living paycheck to paycheck, report reveals
item.description: A new Bank of America Institute report shows 24% of U.S. households live paycheck to paycheck in 2025, up from last year as inflation continues to out...

item.title: 5 on board American Airlines flight hospitalized after odor diverts plane
item.description: American Airlines Flight 2118 was diverted to Houston, Texas, after the crew "reported fumes in the flight deck and cabin," according to the FAA.
